interaction_vector.description: In frontal view, a robot approaches from above, aligning with the positive Z-axis.

usage_context.robot_action: Reach down to grasp cap and twist
usage_context.description: This point allows the robot to securely grip and remove the bottle cap.

rationale: The cap is crucial for sealing the bottle. The robot needs to approach from above to effectively grip it.

interaction_vector.description: In frontal view, the robot approaches the body of the bottle from above, corresponding to the positive Z-axis.

usage_context.robot_action: Reach down to grasp the bottle body and lift
usage_context.description: The body of the bottle provides a stable area for grasping and lifting.

rationale: The body of the bottle is designed for stability, making it the ideal area for a secure grasp. Approaching from above is necessary for effective lifting.

interaction_vector.description: In frontal view, the bottle bottom indicates a downward direction, which is the negative Z-axis.

usage_context.robot_action: Lower bottle until the bottom makes contact
usage_context.description: The bottom of the bottle is where it contacts the surface, providing stability.

rationale: The bottom is critical for ensuring the bottle remains upright. This point is essential for contact interaction when placing the bottle down.

interaction_vector.description: In frontal view, the robot approaches the neck from above, aligned with the positive Z-axis.

usage_context.robot_action: Reach to grasp the neck and tilt to pour
usage_context.description: The neck provides a controlled area to hold the bottle while pouring.

rationale: The neck is designed for precise control during pouring actions. Approaching from above allows proper grip to tilt the bottle.

interaction_vector.description: In frontal view, the label area is aligned to be viewed horizontally.

usage_context.robot_action: Direct sensor or camera towards the label
usage_context.description: The label area allows for identification of the bottle's contents through visual recognition.

rationale: The label's visibility is critical for identification purposes, facilitating user interaction and identification from various angles.
